mapper.sql: ID, USER_ID, RECV_ID, CONTENT, ACK, SEND_TIME, VALID_TIME, GMT_CREATED, GMT_MODIFIED,IDENTITY
mapper.update:
update UMS_MSG_DRAFT
USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
RECV_ID = #{recvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
ACK = #{ack,jdbcType=INTEGER},
SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR},
GMT_CREATED = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP},
IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=CHAR},
where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}

update UMS_MSG_DRAFT set USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, RECV_ID = #{recvId,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, CONTENT = #{content,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, ACK = #{ack,jdbcType=INTEGER}, SEND_TIME = #{sendTime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, VALID_TIME = #{validTime,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, GMT_CREATED = #{gmtCreated,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, GMT_MODIFIED = #{gmtModified,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, IDENTITY = #{identity,jdbcType=CHAR} where ID = #{id,jdbcType=CHAR}
mapper.select: SELECT count(*) FROM UMS_MSG_DRAFT where USER_ID = #{userId,jdbcType=CHAR}
